website_summaries.verdict: A great speaker system for those who want to enjoy theater-quality sound at home.
pros: Equipped with a down-firing subwoofer that provides superb sound across a living space
Dedicated subwoofer control knob makes it simple to customize the bass
Convenient power, volume, and headphone jack are located on the right front satellite speaker
cons: May intermittently emit static every few seconds
Cannot be controlled by TV or remote

customer_reviews.title: Horrible screeching sound in back speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I posted a video with my review, in it you can see there is a horrible screeching sound that comes out of both rear speakers. Wait till after the first lightning strike. Other then that dialog sounds very garbled in them too. I noticed while unpacking the back speakers had very noticibly different zip ties on the cords. I think I was sent out one that was defective a repackaged. That is potentially supported by the fact that when picking up the box the bottom fell out as the sealing sticker on it was apperently loose. Going return. Right now I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!  Hooked up to an LED TV
customer_reviews.text: It gets five stars because of the value. I paid a measly $60 for it and it puts out good sound, not great but pretty good. For that price I could not be more pleased. It's not really a true 5.1 surround sound unless you plug it into a true surround sound card. Few things have that card except maybe for some scattered computers. Nonetheless, the fake surround sound isn't too bad. Better than listening to the tinny TV speaker by a long shot. Make sure you have audio OUT ports on your TV (either a headphone jack or RCA).
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The set up is easy. My only complaints are the wires can get ...
customer_reviews.text: The sounds from the speakers are clear and crisp. You can really take the volume up and turn it loud on these guys. The subwoofer has a deep "BOOM" sound as you would expect from one. The set up is easy. My only complaints are the wires can get a bit messy and there are no mounts on the speakers. They have to be set on top of a surface.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ta

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product... but Amazon saves the day!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get my brand new set of speakers today. Logitech is known to make a quality product, so I was quite surprised to find that the speakers intermittently emit a static every few seconds. Reading through the reviews, this seems to be a common occurrence. Shame on you Logitech for putting a shotty product on the market... I went to try to return the product only to find that it is not returnable; however, after a one minute phone call with Amazon, I was told that I would be provided with a full refund of the product even though it couldn't be returned. Great job Amazon for proving to be persistently committed to outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: started out great, but the quality is starting to fade after less than 9 months of ownership
customer_reviews.text: these speakers were absolutely fantastic for the first 9 months i owned them, but just recently i noticed the audio would randomly cut out for just an instant at a time, but come right back. then, just now as i was playing something, it started happening more frequently, but i noticed that turning down the volume helped. now, its to the point that if i have the volume anywhere above half, the audio in every speaker except the middle and sub start rapidly cutting in and out, to the point where its unusable. they still work perfectly if i keep the volume lower than half, but its still a nuisance..
customer_reviews.author: mark walter

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE damaged& plug wires won’t stay This is junk &they won’t accept return Terrible company
customer_reviews.text: It will connect the plugs won’t fit mine. I bought on a deal but after 10+ years I’ve realized even tough it’s prime or deal you can still have issues. What would hook up did not have good sound quality. I boxed it up very neatly and now I’m told nonreturnable This is not a good product our system we’ve had sounds much better. Don’t do it def not worth the money. I’m just out of $50+ dollars
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Not the Logitech I knew and loved...
customer_reviews.text: after a few weeks a channel went out. Cheap crap made in China. Shoulda bought BETTER crap made in China...
customer_reviews.author: doggy dad

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality, bass and volume are all good, but you still get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1) Price - for under $65, what beats it? 2) Quality - the speakers don't feel cheap and toy-like, and they really sound good. Movies and video games are clear, and the bass booms. Cons For me there is only one con, which is that when there is no audio playing, the speakers emit a rather irritating hum. It has nothing to do with the source audio. The two front speakers have it the worse, and even if I turn the volume as low as 2 or 3, you can still hear it. But if anything is playing, I don't notice the sound.
customer_reviews.author: EducatedConsumer

customer_reviews.title: So nice, bought it twice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband this set for his desktop last Christmas. He’s a gamer and he really likes the surround sound. We’re long distance this year due to work so I bought myself the same set for my computer and I love them for the music quality sound they produce. They are also capable of being very loud. I can hear the music clearly on the other end of the house. Especially for the price, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jill W.

customer_reviews.title: They could be better.
customer_reviews.text: For the cheap price they work good for a entry level 5.1 system. However I ended up buying another bigger logitech set for my game-rig, and then demoting this Z506 set to the bedroom to just play light music and nature noise through the night (I live in a city/urban noise area). So: Good for the money, but lack quality sound for real great gaming experiences.
customer_reviews.author: IncredibleHat

customer_reviews.title: Tasty bass
customer_reviews.text: I worked as a semi-pro audio producer for years, so I don't think I've got the worst ears. And I've got to say -- I certainly wouldn't want to mix on it or anything, as it's NOT flat -- but for a basic surround system for your computer, this is really not bad at all. Powerful bass, doesn't need to be cranked to be clear. I haven't gotten much out of the rear speakers, most movies on netflix seem to just have reverb going to them, but that's just what it is. Highly recommended for an under $100 system.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Good PC speakers
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great surround sound. Appealing design. Easy-access headphone jack. Subwoofer has good bass. Easy setup instructions. Cons: Speaker wire lengths are rather strange. Power button requires too much force to turn on and off. Requires whole hand to hold speaker while pressing it. Recommended? Yes, if you're using it for a computer or for TV in a small room. There's no remote so it's not ideal for a large room. For a larger home theater setup I'd recommend a combo of surround sound amplifier and speakers. I also ended up buying some RCA extension cables because some in this set were too short. The ones I bought are here:
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: The system does require a sound card
customer_reviews.text: I got this sound system because I read several questions that said the you can just plug it into your pc and that its usable with a laptop. No its not. The speakers require three audio jacks "Green" "Black" and "Orange" to all be plugged in otherwise the system won't function properly, some speakers may not produce sound while others will project sound from the wrong speaker (ie: rear left will project sound from the front right). After I purchased a sound card and actually got the hassle of setting everything up the speakers are great and the sound quality is amazing, at least compared to the normal 2.1 speakers I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Useless. Unfortunately, this item is not returnable, which I didn't know.
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. It puts out adequate separated sound but there is no remote control to adjust the volume or mute it except to turn the knob on the speaker which is humbug. I wouldn't have bought it if I had noticed that it is unreturnable. Also, it won't connect with a receiver which would have a remote. I am very unhappy with this product. It is of no use yo me so I just threw $60 out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for a PS4 but only if you buy a digital to analog converter.
customer_reviews.text: These are super speakers. The sound is terrific. If there is anything I was disappointed in was the fact that I couldn't connect them to my PS4 because they do not have any sort of input for an optical cable. It winds up that I had to buy from Amazon a Panlong ® 5.1 Audio Gear Digital Sound Decoder Converter - Optical SPDIF/ Coaxial Dolby AC3 DTS to 5.1CH Analog Audio to plug my optical cable from the PS4 and these speakers into for them to be able to work with the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Auvy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok... downgrade from their model they had years ago
customer_reviews.text: My other logitech surround system was finally going out after 12 years, 5 moves. It held up well and produced a great quality sound. Each speaker had two speakers and the sub was larger. This system is a downgrade from what they produced in the past. The sound is hollow even with adjusting the sub. The quality of materials doesn't seem as good as it used to. I purchased for $56 here on amazon. Glad I didn't pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: I just had some crappy USB speakers before and figured I needed an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I just had some crappy USB speakers before and figured I needed an upgrade. Holy hell these speakers are great. I tried a stream video of something that I had to lean close to listen to and then plugged these in and I had to lean back even at 1/2 of bass/speaker volume/and at 1/2 my pc volume. Music sounds amazing on them as well without losing any high notes or treble (even at the ridiculously loud max bass). I wasn't expecting this set up to work like this but it did. 5/5 all the way with the quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ugly Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z506 Surround Sound - Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about the sound of this Logitech Z506 because of the low price, but I am blown away at how truly wonderful it sounds. It gives you nice, clear, highs, decent mids, and the sub surprisingly can crank out some bass. Am I saying this is the best surround sound system on the market? Of course not, however for the price, in my opinion, it is worth every penny and the sound is truly wonderful for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: TheAlchemist

customer_reviews.title: Soundbars Suck
customer_reviews.text: I have a $200 soundbar that I replaced with this unit and it blows that sound bar out of the water. I use to have issues hearing certain sounds and tones out of my bar but have no issues with this unit. I do wish the cables were longer but nothing some extension cables couldn't fix. If your looking for a lot of sound for not a lot of money this is for you! Be warned though as these can not be wall mounted. I made that mistake but im still ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barat

customer_reviews.title: very happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Logitech Z313, very happy I did. The difference is quite impressive, besides being 5.1 vs. 2.1. I am in my 60s and have had a lot of stereo/audio systems and various speakers in my life, some cheap, mid range, expensive. The quality for the buck here exceeds my expectations. I was surprised by the subtleties in sounds and instruments I hear in both music and movies for a system this size and price. Is it suited for a large home theater that you want to shake the house down with, .... no. But this system at half volume will fill your room with impressive sound volume and quality for the modest price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Rapid staccato sound after 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for five weeks then started making a rapid staccato sound. At first I thought the washer in the next apartment was overfull and cycling down. Then I noticed it was the speakers. Now they work sometimes, and don't others, and always the rapid staccato.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Maciver

customer_reviews.title: Wooh! What a system!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. All I'm going to say is that these things are Insane for how small they are. I've still never turned it up to half way because everyone else in the house will start to hear it. The cable length is good as well. When I purchased this, I was worried that I would need an adapter or a receiver because of all the reviews and the "customers also bought" recommendations. YOU ONLY NEED TO BUY THIS ONE PRODUCT. There is nothing else you need, it connects with an auxiliary cable right to my TV and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were adequate for a few months. They were never "good" speakers, but they were okay for the price until the right-front speaker developed a rattle. It sounds like static, but if you put your hand on it, the rattle goes away. If you place the speaker on something soft, it gets somewhat better although it's still annoying. There's something loose in there but It's impossible to open the speaker to repair it. I can't find a way in without breaking the enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Low volume, terrible product and misleading description.
customer_reviews.text: It said Non Returnable in comments so I kept them. Technically I opened them, and description states unopened returns only for this. The review is misleading by putting these in BEST category. When my tablet speaker is louder than your speakers at full volume....there is a problem. These are by no means loud enough. It's so bad, I've lost all respect for the manufacturer. They got my 80 bux this time, but NEVER again. It's now a dead brand as far as I'm concerned. Worst speaker set I've ever bought. Should be called the whisper model.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mysteriouso

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is Lacking
customer_reviews.text: I had the Logitech X-530 speakers and after over 10 years of use, I blew the subwoofer. I wanted the same ones but they have tripled in price since I originally purchased them so I got these instead. They sound kind of tinny in the trebles and mids compared to the X-530s but the bass is nice and rich still. Overall I wouldn't buy these again and when they break I will go back to the X-530s or something other than this model.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Speaker shorts out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered this product two times. Both times the wire that connects the main speaker (with power button and volume knob) to the subwoofer has shorted out. The first time within a month and the second time within just under a year. I would suggest something with a little more durability. This model is very weak in sound and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Joseph Mcminn

customer_reviews.title: Best speakers below $50
customer_reviews.text: Where do I even begin with these speakers... The sound quality is amazing, the bass is powerful and clean, the cables are more than long enough for my needs, and the price is fantastic. I'm a musician and, while obviously these are not studio speakers or THX speakers, they do what I need them to more than well. I've also tried these on many genres of games and movies, and these speakers don't stop blowing me away.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great, took a little figuring out since my ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great, took a little figuring out since my motherboard has a 7.1 layout, so I had to swap plugs out until I had them all in the right place. Keep in mind most PC sound content is stereo so three of the speakers will usually not be doing anything. But things like DVD/Bluray movies, higher-end games, and HD video streaming can potentially have 5.1/7.1 output and this is where this setup shines. They're LOUD, and the subwoofer pushes some pretty heavy bass, enough to make my neighbor ask if I got a new sound system.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: I love this system
customer_reviews.text: I love this system. I got it to use in our master bedroom and it's perfect for that little area. The set up on it was fairly simple and everything works great. I had no issues connecting it to my TV and the cords are long enough that they stretch across to where I wanted all the speakers to go. The sound quality is great considering how small they are. The bass is great too and you can turn it to wherever you need it. Overall I am very happy with this and would definitely consider buying another for a different room. I really don't have any complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Al Stew

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sound system for those on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Capable of strong bass notes while the satellites and central speaker do a great job. Cables are long enough that rear speakers can be at a distance from the TV/monitor and can be hidden away. I have yet to blow any of these speakers, unlike other brands around this price range. There is no static interference between speakers which shows these are well insulated cables. This is great purchase that has sustained over many months.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Really good speakers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these are the most underappreciated Speakers ever. For the price, these are the best that you can get. They are very loud. For some strange reason, this little subwoofer that is 5 inches is a lot stronger than it appears. It is extremely efficient and is the best subwoofer for it's size. These are great for watching movies or for music. The one thing I didn't like about these speakers were the fact that the wires were not very long. These speakers also cannot be mounted on walls which is a huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: although there are options out there to do on your own (brackets and some velcro) I wouldve liked them to have something in the ways of mounting
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of logitech z506's, i have one hooked up to my computer and one for surround sound on my TV. The sound is crisp and clear, no interference in the lines or anything. The only reasoning for 4 stars instead of 5 is the lack of mount holes, although there are options out there to do on your own (brackets and some velcro) I wouldve liked them to have something in the ways of mounting. Secondly, the length of the rear speaker wires could be a little longer, again, I know there are extensions out there. So yea, other than these two small gripes, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is Right!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the greatest surround sound speakers you can buy, but for the price these speakers are exceptional. You get a bang for your buck. Makes a heck a lot of a difference with your overall entertainment experience and have no complaints, easy installation, bass is very sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I like the product overall
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall. It was easy to hook up and everything was there. I also had no problems with it, which is good. The sound is excellent for such a small system and I was surprised at the 150 watt rating it is given. Having said that, it is a little distorted at higher volumes. I expect that a system should be able to handle sound almost to a maximum volume level before distortion. I feel distortion happens around 80-85%. It isn't bad, though, considering the little speakers are just that: little. I am very pleased with it and the bass is pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: pianoman

customer_reviews.title: Not the best if you have built-in 7.1 surround sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a devil of a time getting the rear and center channels to work. Sound quality from the two front speakers fills the whole house though. UPDATE: Got the rear and center channels to work. Amazing sound for the price. I'm, by no means, an audiophile. For music and gaming, this meets my needs just fine. Love the base response!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Russell

customer_reviews.title: No failures here
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what failures the other reviewers are talking about. I picked these up in Jan 2016 and they're still going strong over a year later. I've got them hooked to my desktop PC and stream music for 3-4 hours a day with them. They'll stay on 24x7 unless the power goes out. The sound quality is very good and they go as loud as I want in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Best surround sound available under $75
customer_reviews.text: This guy does great. If you're in a small room PC gaming this surround sound system is ideal. Plugs directly into the 6 channel plugs in the back and rocks. Good sound quality, killer base, easy to adjust volume. Checks all the boxes and now I can hear those pesky knife boys sneaking up on my sniper post because the SOUND IS LITTERALY BEHIND ME. This system has improved my k/d ratio because I get snuck up on less. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John Sheesley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our computer because we have no TV. So we watch movies and such on our computer. These speakers work great! The sound quality is very good. Love the surround sound effect when we put speakers around the room. Volume control is easy to maneuver. Speakers are sturdy and holding up well. They are a good size - big enough to do the job, not so big that they are very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed by Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers.  Center fill and independent volume controls would be nice though.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice speakers and I'm fairly happy with them. I'm coming from having an old Z-640 set, and the front speakers seem to have a more spatial effect. I almost don't need the center channel or rear speakers to be filled in on stereo sources... almost. I'm really missing the independent volume controls. The center channel is too loud for me (at my desk under my monitor), and the rear speakers seem quiet. The center fill button would be nice to have too - I can emulate that through software like I do for the rear speakers, but I can't adjust the volume, so it works but not well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for the buck. They do put out really good sound for the price, but I do have a few issues. The #1 issue is the quality. One of the speakers died, and from reading other reviews, quality has been an issue. (But at this price point, I'm ok with it.) Another issue is that the speakers aren't wall mount, so I had to use double sided sticky tape to hang them up. Also, the cords aren't nearly long enough. I had to get longer cords and adapters to distance them correctly with my TV. Overall though, they're cheap speakers. I wasn't expecting them to be the best, but they really do put out some good sound!
customer_reviews.author: timbbd

customer_reviews.title: If aux,  only use green
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my room to connect to my projector. The speakers are set up under my bed, and the sound is very clear and the bass is extremely surprising. Watching movies with this is amazing, NOTE. You should really only connect one device at a time, i noticed If you try connecting 2 systems via aux, (black and green) the speakers will only use 2.1 instead of the 5.1 sound (so if you're connecting via aux, only use the green port alone)
customer_reviews.author: Karlo Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very cheap, but terrible quality, the equipment burns
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2017 but I did not bother to classify until now: _ I had great excitement when I tried it, and much more when it came to my country, it sounded great with the sound card of my pc, but on the third day of use, when playing it in high volume, it burned in the fourth song the equipment was damaged, having the guarantee, I could not send it back since the shipment is very expensive from my country. I lost the money in this team plus the money sent. _ If you buy this equipment and have a good sound card on your computer do not give it high volume because that equipment burns.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have such deep baas and clear audio quality for the price. You really can't find anything better at this price point. + Great sounds + Quality construction, they are plastic but durable + Bass is very deep + Cables are very long - Cables are not detachable 4/5 - Cables are a letdown for not being detachable but it is still a great unit
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect to love this system.
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually do revues, but... Just set this up in my small home office. Sound is fantastic for a small room (8x10). I play video games and watch movies on a PC and highly recommend this if you want surround sound in a smaller room. Plugged it in and it worked without going to settings. All the speakers have color coded ends which made it easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. You can't find better sound for this price. But no wall or celling mount on these speakers makes them useless. Who the heck at Logitech said "hey guys, let's make surround sound speakers, but give the user no way to mount the rear speakers on a wall or ceiling!" Apparently, they think the speakers can just float in the air magically, or that I want speaker stands directly behind my computer chair. I ended up mounting them to the celling with command strips which is working OK after a few days so far, but seriously I shouldn't have to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Legit Review

customer_reviews.title: I bought these on a whim and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim and I'm glad I did. I was hesitant at first because I had red mixed reviews but decided to chance it. I love how I can use them with my computer, sound system, and etc. Sound quality is phenomenal, they're easy to set-up and use, and they get decently loud which is a nice little plus. At first, I was worried because I was listening to a music video on YouTube and noticed that not all of the speakers were producing sound. However, it's because not all videos/songs and whatnot are made for surround sound so keep that it mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: higher volumes now sound like the speakers are fuzzy & blowing
customer_reviews.text: Product has been used off & on, intermittently, for a little over a year now, and the volume control is wonky. I have to tap the knob to make the volume go up; sometimes it gets louder, sometimes softer. Otherwise, turning the knob has no effect. Also, higher volumes now sound like the speakers are fuzzy & blowing. Didn't realize that we bought a rental. Not the durablity / quality I expected from Logitech. Anymore it seems like most electronics have a 1 year shelf life; seems like Logitech is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie T

customer_reviews.title: Incredible speakers for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get 5.0 surround sound without spending a fortune. They are wired not wireless, but quality of sound is great and a big difference in sound quality when playing blue ray movies or the NFL on Amazon. This is my second set in 11 years. I bought the first set refurbished and they lasted 10 years! The speaker quality was a little clearer on the first set but still really good. One of the speaker s did not work but sending a new one. The best speakers for the money. Cheaper than 2.0 sound bars that miss several highs and lows when watching a movie or a game. You can not go wrong with these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jmaxtx

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best "cheap" speakers. They play like moderate range speakers from name brands and are perfect for PC or smaller rooms. They fill the room perfectly and the effects of the surround sound are great. Obviously being cheaper they have some range issues when compared to a more high end home theater system, but you are not going to get much better for this price. The bass is also excellent, really loud for how small it is. (Could easily rumble your room and the one next to it)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Amazon service is great! Though I got this product intime,the sound system would work only for ~10 mins and power off. This has been continuously happening. I tried various ways to fix it but couldn’t. Tried for a customer care help before refund and they suggested to refund. But I have asked for a replacement of this same item because I loved the system by it looks and first 10 minutes of work. But no replacement. In Q/A section, I have asked for a solution for this issue to be fixed without refund/replace. But I got a reply like “Item is defective and send it to amazon for refund”. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shinu

customer_reviews.title: Best PC and Console Standalone Audio System Brand
customer_reviews.text: Logitech has provided me with over 20 years of top quality gaming sound. I wouldnt go with anything else for PC and Console gaming audio for an all in one speaker setup. Of course if you have a great receiver with an upmixer/matrix for some stellar audio, that would trump these for sure. For the little amount of money you spend, this is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaNutjob

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews before i purchased this and the reviews are all over the place. I haven't ever had any problems with Logitech, they are a good company. So i bought them anyways and i can definitely say this is one of the best ive ever owned. Amazing quality, great price, everyone that comes over says it like a movie theatre and you can feel the intensity. I have absolutely no cons.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Volume Knob broken
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 3 stars because the volume knob on the front is basically useless. When I try to adjust the knob the volume is very erratic! It seems that the potentiometer inside of the knob is broken. Even if I don't touch the knob, I can hear the sound get quieter and louder just from the little movement that the speakers make. The sound quality is still great though!
customer_reviews.author: Austen Christensen

customer_reviews.title: I just received the replacement surround sound by Logitech. Everything is all good now
customer_reviews.text: I just received the replacement surround sound by Logitech. The last one had 2 speakers that did not work but this replacement has one speaker that don't work. I want to return both of them.
customer_reviews.author: MEYERS

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I just this and installed on my tv and also connected Bluetooth receiver for my music. It sounds great. Bass is solid and balanced. I can hear the details and it is very powerful. I put on half volume and I can’t even use mid volume on tv and my phone while playing because it is loud. 150watt is certainly more than enough for my house. I am very happy with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Doyuran

customer_reviews.title: logitech support is bad!! very BAD!!
customer_reviews.text: had this unit for about 7 months before i lost sound in the right front speaker. i contacted the service center and it took them about 3 months to resolve my issue and get another unit to me. the unit they sent was a down grade and had no wires! so now i have to buy extra things to get a system that has been down for 3 months working again. there customer care has been absolute crap!! i have bought and owned a lot of logitech products and this particular item broke and they failed to resolve the issue appropriately. very disappointed and will probably not buy logitech again. i have lost all confidence in their products and warranties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I'm a serious audiophile and I needed something to drown out the herd of rhinos that live above me. These are perfect, I'm a big fan of Logitech products to begin with and these are so amazing. They were easy to setup and sound great for music and video games. Especially the ones that have surround sound, when stuff is sneaking up behind you the 3D effect is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Komal S

customer_reviews.title: Sounds surprisingly good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a cheap powered 5.1 system onto my workstation without spending a bunch of money. Sadly there are not many inexpensive powered 5.1 systems. This one has fit the bill for me and the sound is better than my previous under monitor speakers. The tweeters are fake, which annoys me. But for the money I cannot complain. Great for casual listening and a good unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NMH

customer_reviews.title: Very loud! With hard hitting bass.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good surround sound for the money. I use them for my PC replacing a 2 speaker and sub low basic system. My only downside that I've noticed so far, I am hearing a slight static interference when I am not playing anything. When I do play music especially something with bass it hits very hard. Has way more bass than the previous system I used. This system does seem like overkill but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: The Techman

customer_reviews.title: Rears are so powerful
customer_reviews.text: I just got this set. For some reason the REARS over power everything and my center channel almost seems to lower itself when dialogue is being said. So I miss some things during action scenes. Anyway to balance the speakers? Turn up the Center channel? If there isnt a way. Then stay away from these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Triantafillou

customer_reviews.title: Impressive System
customer_reviews.text: The limited time that I have spent at that computer, these speakers are a welcome addition to my computer room. They have performed above expectations, be it online audio source or my own audio / video discs. The sub is clear and finite, I enjoy the weight, size and sound qualities of the satellites too. I will stick to wired sound. Too many of my wireless systems have failed. I would recommend and easily purchase this system again, should the similar need arise.
customer_reviews.author: TNMTNHM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Wires are short. The sound quality is not up to par with the exceptions of all the Logitech I have purchased in the past. I got these for my TV because they were rated for a Television. This is my fifth purchase of Logitech speakers and never been unhappy until these. I can’t decide if I should return them or if I might get more pleasure beating them with a hammer. Don’t waste your money on these. I am most likely going to not buy Logitech in the future due to how bad these are, I would think that Logitech would allow such poor quality on any of their equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D Blythe

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I've only had this system for a few days. I really enjoy the sound quality this system boasts. It fills my master bedroom surprisingly well, without shaking the walls and upsetting my neighbors. My one complaint is that there is no optical (toslink) input, which is admittedly an uncommon input anyhow, so it's not a major complaint. I had to buy a separate adapter to make it work. However, I also bought the Bluetooth adapter and can hook multiple devices to the speakers at once, which is incredible. I love this system and would buy it again if I needed another speaker setup.
customer_reviews.author: mischief

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this product. It was a Christmas gift. My spouse had just tried to set it up. The package looked liked it had been returned, then shipped to me. It does not work. I will know better than to order electronics online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommeded
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my office. The sound quality is really good. I went to an electronics store to test the sound and I liked them better than the Bose single speaker that was priced for more. If you are looking for a good sound at lower volumes these will work well. They sound great at higher volumes too.
customer_reviews.author: StellaMarie

customer_reviews.title: THESE FILL MY CLASSROOM WITH PRETTY DECENT SOUND
customer_reviews.text: I love this system hooked to my classroom PC and video projector. The sound quality and volume are great. If you are going to move this to fill a large room make sure to buy the proper gauge RCA extension cables (see link below). I bought just the standard RCA cables, cheapest ones, and the sound quality was GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from these speakers! These speaker quality is terrible sounded like the speakers were going to die on me, crackled. I returned the 1st set, received the 2nd set which are acting up the company doesn't believe that this could ever happen I would never buy these again. I will spend the extra $ for somthing better.
customer_reviews.author: Kell82

customer_reviews.title: Came with one speaker already blown. Cannot be controlled ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with one speaker already blown. Cannot be controlled by TV or by remote. Back speakers had weird feedback. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, super performance!
customer_reviews.text: Using this as the sound system on a gaming PC desktop. I'm no audiophile, but wow. This set has totally changed my speaker/non-headphone audio experience. It literally shakes the floor in my room. It was really easy to physically set up. The Front-Left speaker (parked between my mouse and main monitor) has a volume control and power button for easy fast changes during drunken playlist spamming. So far, only tested on music apps and Youtube, so not sure about gaming/FPS performance, but for music, wow. Just wow. Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Srh93

customer_reviews.title: Mine Came With Pops and Buzzing In Some of the Speakers and Messed Up Cables.
customer_reviews.text: So the speakers came with wires that were pretty cheap and were damaged to the effect that even the slightest movement of the cable would cause distortion. I was also hearing a buzzing and pop in a couple speakers that I thought might be connected to the wire issue, well even with higher quality wires the speakers would pop and buzz. I have a feeling this speaker system would have been great if I had a gotten a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They just perfectly play whatever sound quality/quantity is in the media you are trying to listen to. If the sound is not good then that is because of the media but not because of the speakers. I tested it. I'm glad to get this kind of speakers for this price. Extremely satisfied and I hope it will stay this way. Yes, lot of wires but can't complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SSYP

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I knew buying this that I wasn't getting top of the line. I'm OK with that. BUT - the total lack of directions for this piece of equipment was frustrating. Even after going through the Logitech site for guidance I struggled. Eventually I got this hooked up and working, but the struggle made me not like this as much as I wanted to like it. Some troubleshooting for novice users would be helpful! The sound quality is OK for a basic system that we only use for Netflix and kids PS4 games, in a small living room. There is no remote, which for us works well since the kids can't randomly turn up the sound.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Had for 7 months....
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to get these because they were a great deal. But 7 months later they have developed a low level annoying hum which is just terrible. It sounds like an electrical defect but the humming does not stop. Sad. You can feel the vibration in the base box also.
customer_reviews.author: Bushmasterlover

customer_reviews.title: Wow, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the sound you get from this fifty-some dollar surround sound system! I agonized for days on which set to purchase, went with these in the end (obviously), and glad I did! Note - The YouTube reviews on these can't possibly give you an idea of the sound quality, and as a matter of fact, some reviews make you think these are horrible, but they are great! The Creative brand similar in price to these had waaaaay too many negative reviews. The sub is only 5 1/4 inch, but it is a TRUE subwoofer, with a proper gigantic and heavy magnet. I would buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Jono G.

customer_reviews.title: not really reliable..
customer_reviews.text: the product sounds great, bass is good i dont play the overall sound over 50% of its limit, after 11 months im finally leaving a review. the reason it gets 2 stars is because 2 speakers went out on me at the 7 month mark, which ruins the "surround sound" part of the system, the product only has a 30 day warranty and i didn't buy the 3 years extension, but i shouldn't have had to need a warranty by month 7. its upsetting that i dont blast my speakers or abuse them and yet they're already broken. and now todays they're priced at $120 which is way more than what i spent 11 months ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A.

customer_reviews.title: Really could of been 5 stars :(
customer_reviews.text: Sub decided to quickly die a month after mild use. Pro tip: How you should view the review scale for this product. I agree this is a 5 star product if it didn't fail and Logitech was at all simple to process or even submit an RMA. Seriously I cannot figure out their website RMA submission process. The speaker quality sounds great especially for the price. BUT look closely at the low star percentages. It seems that there is a 1 in 4 chance you will be receiving a defective product. I really expected Logitech to be better quality than this. I've had many good experiences with them in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Penninger

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended For A Computer and/or Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this set - I wasn't sure what I was getting but I have my Xbox hooked up to it and it sounds amazing. I also just switch the cable to use it with my computer and I have no issues there either. The bass is very deep (and you can turn that up or down to your preference - a feature I really like). The quality is excellent and I've had no build issues with it at all. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good price and sound for inexpensive speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the bedroom tv,Not super load,just right for someone like me that hard of hearing.With the use of optional rca cables,I spread them out.Good price for not going broke for a set of speakers. Optional bluetooth adapter you can stream music to them
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Urso

customer_reviews.title: 4 years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I've had these speakers for over 4 years, they've moved cross country with me without skipping a beat. They sound great. Get some cheap extension cables if you need to position them better, sound quality is great, I'm half deaf and I can catch almost every word that comes out of them
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Bought two and they were both garbage!
customer_reviews.text: While their cost is alright and the 7.1 surround is nice for those who use it, the quality on these speakers has been the worst I've ever had to endure. The first set had a terrible drumming sound coming out of several speakers, which eventually started to happen with the second set. The second set was also plagued with a more-than-occasional crackling, popping sound. I HATE these speakers, and will likely never turn to Logitech for speakers ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Zessei

customer_reviews.title: Very basic set of noise makers.
customer_reviews.text: They surround you. They make sounds. They pop when you turn the tele-viewer on and off. I have them plugged directly into it, however, so maybe that's my issue. Other than that... meh. It does it's thing. The bass is pretty good for what it is. I had to turn it to about a quarter to keep MatPat from sounding like God from Monty Python.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Mahn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing for the money I spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself around Christmas and when it worked right it was amazing but as of yesterday the rear speakers started sounding super compressed and when nothing is on there is a weird staticky type noise on them which is why I can't really rate these well. That being said the parts are surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.author: kamala marin

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming ! BF 4 sounds so much better ! For the price, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! I used to have a 32 inch sound bar as my speaker for my 55 inch TV, but Z506 is huge upgrade from my pervious speaker. The sound is great for my Ps4. It totally changes my experience with Battlefield 4. Now the explosive sounds are so loud and realistic ! I tried to watch movies on Amazon Prime the voice is kinda of weak to hear. Not sure if it is because of the speaker or the Prime service. However, I used mainly for gaming and I really just ignored watching movie. For the price. I do not really have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: These speakers sound ok but the subwoofer is noisy
customer_reviews.text: The subwoofer makes a clearly audible buzzing/clicking sound. I didn't notice it at first so I can't say if it was there all along. Now that I am aware of it I find it very annoying. If I turn the volume on the sub up to get really nice bass the noise gets very loud. In between songs its impossible to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: joatmor

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I set this up in my son's room. He uses it for music and movies. Sound quality is great and volume is easy to control and gets very loud if you want it to. The only thing I don't like is the wires everywhere but that can't be helped unless you invest in a more expensive wireless system.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Surround Sound Home Theater speaker set for my bedroom! 5 stars....
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for my Flatscreen 19 inch Element TV. Element is a TV Walmart brand. Perfect for watching movies and VHS. This is the perfect buy for the perfect price. not bad for 70 dollars. I would shop on Amazon for anything. Plus Amazon's new Shipping carrier AMZL.US got my package to the right address really really quick. I mean really really quick. Good job amazon. I will shop every day on Amazon, if I could. I wish that it came with a remote though but still a awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake E. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker system at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: There are actually more speakers here then I need. It provides plenty of sound, which is all that I am looking for. I have it running from my TV set. And I often run my display from a computer to my TV set, so I also get the sound from my computer coming through these speakers. Videos, music, games, etc. One thing that I consider a downside is that the Base Control is on the large Boom Box, while the Volume Control is on one of the smaller speakers. I would have preferred to have both the Base control and Volume control at the same location, preferably on the smaller speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Hayes

customer_reviews.title: comes really fast but mine came faulty going try and return it!
customer_reviews.text: i was so happy to get it so fast but after hooking it up starting having issues with not wanting to play in 5.1 after many hours of trying many things i got it to work only to find out one of the speakers is blown and another one has static coming from it! I hooked it up other ways but the same two speakers did the same thing! By saying I hooked it up other ways I mean by my sound blaster card front then back then onboard sound
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid Surround System
customer_reviews.text: This System has been around for years. It is still one of the best values for a home theater system surround for your computer. Ample rear cable length to run satellite speakers. Excellent choice for an entry level speaker with good to great bass and no appreciable distortion.
customer_reviews.author: tymeus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was actually blown away by the quality of this system, compared to the price. It sounds fantastic for a desktop surroundsound system, and the bass control is absolutely a plus. The sleek style and terrific sound, along with ease of assembly, makes it a very appealing product. So much so, I bought another set for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Cortland Haefele

customer_reviews.title: Is not compatible with RCA style jacks
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a Surround Sound System. However, it does not support the standard RCA type cable structure used on televisions. While there are adapters available, it speaks volumes about the cheapness of the product when they dont bother to add simple cable adapters, which would add virtually nothing to the price. Poorly described and not customer friendly.
customer_reviews.author: steven kimbell

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for a budget Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for a budget Surround Sound. I purchased them for my dad, shortly before he passed away and he lit up when he heard his music coming out of the little speakers. Great for music, movies, and TV.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of surround speakers at an unbeatable price. I've had these for a couple of weeks and I absolutely love them. They are connected to my TV (which is also connected to a Dell Chromebook 13) in my living room. Great for listening to music and getting better sound than the TV speakers. To be fair, I live in an apartment (750 sqft) and this set of speakers does an excellent job. If you are only getting them for your bedroom, these are also great. More than enough I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Speakers, especially if you are coming from 2.1 type speaker set up. Be aware that if you have integrated audio such as Realtek on AM3+ motherboards as I do, I had go through the Realtek Audio Manager software to configure 5.1 surround sound. Some games like The Witcher 3 only work in Stereo sound so you can still configure all speakers to still work but have to set the software to "stereo". Not as loud as I like it, so if you can go for continuous 100 to larger Wattage Speakers I would do so.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Peiris M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers. Though the first set that was shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. Though the first set that was shipped had a hissing sound amid the great music that we pumped through these bad boys. Not sure if it was bad wiring or a production issue, but with any newly acquired electronic device that doesn't function properly upon initial setup, you are best to return the item for replacement. The team at Logitech emailed return address printouts for the defective set and sent a new product replacement very promptly. Very great customer service and these speakers are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: 4 of 5 speakers DOA
customer_reviews.text: Too large and inconvenient to pack up for UPS, this product has soured me on the Logitech brand. Spent countless hours, even purchasing new surround-sound card, thinking the prob was me, when in fact, poor quality control strikes again. Included NO documentation, just the color graphics on cables/ports.
customer_reviews.author: SF DeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Annoying static buzz.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months of using it no more than 30% of max volume. It started developing an annoying static buzz that would randomly go on and off every few seconds. I check the cords, unplug and plug it again and it's still there.
customer_reviews.author: Vang

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I replaced some 10 year old Logitech speakers that were 350 watts because I had lost 2 of the channels. I expected the new ones to just be disappointing, but didn't want to spend $500 again. I have to say, I was very surprised, they sound much better than I expected, and are louder than expected. Not as loud as the old ones, but good enough. My only complaint is that the speakers don't have any mechanism for a wall mount at all. They are expected to be placed on a desk. I ended up drilling a small hole and screwing in mounts so I could put them on my existing wall mounts.
customer_reviews.author: ML Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great For about a year
customer_reviews.text: Ive had them for a year now and can say they work pretty well for a long time but last three months have experienced annoying speaker popping (imagine popcorn but enough to induce a headache) whether theyve been blown or not the surround now has issues when over a certain range it cuts out. If you buy them make sure you know what your getting into and make sure you leave it on lower volumes.
customer_reviews.author: rathdakrogan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself a few years back and they have performed flawlessly. So I bought them again for my son who's in need of some quality sound for his PC/entertainment system. Highly recommended for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: BullitBird

product_meta.title: Logitech Z506 Surround Sound Home Theater Speaker System
product_meta.description:
Style:SpeakerLogitech surround sound speakers z506—for when you want to be moved by big, 5.1 surround sound from your music, movies and games.Connectors: 3x 0.14" / 3.5 mm Audio In Jacks, 1x 0.14" / 3.5 mm Headphone Jack, 2x Stereo RCA Input Jacks, 4x RCA Input Jacks for Speaker System and 1x DB 9 Pin Connector.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER











COMPATIBILITY




COMPARE


Which Logitech Speakers Are Right For You?
feature_bullets: Ported down firing subwoofer pumps out deep, clean, booming bass; The power of sub woofer is 27 watts
Compatibility:Television,Computer,Smartphone,Tablet,Music player,DVD player,Blu ray player,PlayStation,Xbox,Wii .Rich 3D stereo in 5.1 surround sound, even from 2 channel stereo sources
Multiple inputs make it easy to connect your PC, game console, iPod, DVD player and more
75 watts (RMS) of balanced power and room filling sound; On speaker bass control lets you easily dial the bass level up or down
Please Note: Kindly refer the User Guide before use; Works with any device with a headphone jack (3.5mm), RCA or 6 channel direct inputs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars3,976 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #4 in Home Theater Systems#769 in Home Audio Speakers#12,088 in Computer Accessories & Peripherals
